title: Negative IP Balance
body: My girlfriend's account has an IP balance of -970. Can RIOT explain this? It would be appreciated.

replies.body: This sounds like a display issue!  If your girlfriend is still having an issue, have her submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can take a look.  It would be better to help her individually than through a third party!
